Articles.Content:
I am posting this on behalf of a friend of mine, Gaming with Ryan (Ryan123220). He's a gamer, a fellow KSP fan, and an all around nice guy. He's starting a series where he'll be colonizing the Mun, but in a BIG way that should make it all more interesting. This isn't his first KSP series but he's trying things a little differently this time, with his videos, and would appreciate the comments and support as he continues his series. For now, he's keeping the videos short and sweet, allowing the progress of his mission to be easier to follow.

His colonization mission is in a modded install of KSP, so you know ahead of time, but he is running all his launches/mission clean from start to finish. So this means he's showing what happens from launch to landing, and beyond. Lets give him a little support.

His mission starts here, with his first launch video:

[h=1]

[/h]

And don't worry, his spelling and grammar is better then mine.

:edit: Why do I suddenly feel like a poorly done infomercial? huh...
